name: Python Documentation Dark Theme
description: Since we all know most development happens overnight (don't lie to yourself, it does) sometimes burning your eyes out just isn't on the agenda, so I've just reskinned most of the documentation into a discord-dark-like theme, for those extra "why on earth isn't this working?!" days. Don't forget, .join() only takes strings
additional_info:
0.0.1:
• Dark background
• mostly re-coloured syntax highlighting (so it isn't invisible)
• pretty much all pages are recoloured.
